headline: Here’s Why Right Tail Capital Exited Its Position in The Charles Schwab Corporation (SCHW) in 2023
summary: Right Tail Capital, an investment management company, released its second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Right Tail aims to generate high after-tax returns by investing in high-quality public companies for the long term. The letter discussed the three-year journey of Right Tail Capital since its inception. The firm has […]
